item.title: Basic API Gateway endpoint authentication with Cognito User Pools
item.description: In many occasions you don’t want your whole API open to the public. Maybe you want to make some endpoints available to authenticated. In this article we’re going to see how to do that using Amazon Cognito User Pools and AWS Amplify. Let’s start! Amazon Cognito User Pools As the documentation says, a user pool is a user directory in Amazon Cognito. You can allow your users to sign-up, sign-in, etc.
